meanings.definition: An extremely large number, equal to 1,000,000,000,000
meanings.sent1: The national debt reached trillions due to excessive spending.
meanings.sent2: The stars in the sky are said to be in the trillions.
meanings.sent3: I have trillions of chores to do before the party!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was worth more than trillions of diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The idea of traveling through space for trillions of years is mind-boggling.
